mapper.insert: insert into tbl_plan ( id, loginAct, `name`, `group`, createTime, createBy, startDate, endDate, description, ideaId ) values ( #{id}, #{loginAct}, #{name}, #{group}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{description}, #{ideaId} )
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tbl_plan
name like '%' #{name} '%'
loginAct like '%' #{loginAct} '%'
`group` like '%' #{group} '%'
startDate > #{startDate}
endDate < #{endDate}
description like '%' #{description} '%'
mapper.update: update tbl_plan set loginAct = #{loginAct}, `name` = #{name}, `group` = #{group}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, description =#{description}, editTime = #{editTime}, editBy = #{editBy} where id=#{id}
